title: Can't join any queue
body: I can't join any Draft/Blind, ARAM, Ranked queues. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
Agent Mindstar (OCE)  - 3 minutes ago 2 of 2 Rioter Comments
Hi folks - just an update here.

There was an incident on the OCE server earlier this morning (which lines up with when you got initially stuck in games / champ select). This left some players in "ghost games", where different parts of the server think you are in a game, when you are not.

Unfortunately, there's no way for us to re-sync this information without restarting the entire OCE platform. It will eventually self-resolve, once those games expire, which in normal circumstances should take approximately 3 hours.

TL;DR - it should be fixed for each of you within the next hour.
yup they just noticed all of us complaining and are now trying to fix it
